name: App Submission
message: Hi, thanks for starting a listing with us. When your listing is ready submit for approval. For more info on how to complete your listing see here: https://sdq.st/submit

name: Google Drive
message: Hi, thanks for listing with us. Unfortunately we cannot integrate with Google Drive. There are some options available including Dropbox, Github & Glitch. Once you have changed the link, save the listing and submit for approval. For more info see here: https://sdq.st/submit
